ACTOR1: Mutiny of Military Forces of Lesotho (1998-)
ACTOR2: Military Forces of South Africa (1994-)
NOTES: The South African military launches a 600 man invasion of Lesotho to help restore power to the legitimate military. Opposition parties favoring the mutinying engage in a lynch-mob style riot among the citizenry, along with looting shops.

SOURCE: Africa Research Bulletin; Jornal de Noticias; Publ
